summary: When a mad scientist mixes the genes of a killer whale and a wolf, it creates the Whalewolf, and it's up to Sharktopus to stop it.
cast: Casper Van Dien|Catherine Oxenberg|Jennifer Wenger|Akari Endo|Sarodj Bertin|Bruna Rubio|Olga Valdez|Amanda Philipson|Keisha Shadè Akinyemi|Andrew E. Tilles|Claudia Moncada|Mar Flores|Patrick Denver|Patricia Soriano|Mario Ceara|Mario Arturo Hernández|Mario Peguero|Jorge Eduardo De Los Santos|Tony Almont|Yasser Michelén|Juan Maria Almonte|Katyuska Licairac|Ben Farrow|William Simon|Jorge Velazco|Ernesto Baez|Alberto Samboy|Joe Forbes
title: Sharktopus vs. Whalewolf
